channel.title: About recovery fucking stupid
channel.description:
ok right so my account got hacked and i want to recover it but the guy has changed the email so when i click "recover account" then i type account name in then it asks me for a email and i dont know the email and if you dont have the correct email it wont let you go on further to enter the account infomation you know. the guy has changed it to so how the fuck can i recover my account is there a email i can use or a live chat so i can speak to somebody? someone please help its annoying me!?
thank you

item.title: About recovery fucking stupid
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

honestly i lost my pure awhile back i didnt use it much but the guy changed the email and got the acc locked and i know the password now and the username on the acc is 100% my email address but it does not matter which is complete bs since registered email should be the email that’s it’s username.

in all honestly i’d have to say your kinda fucked best thing to do now would be to just restart on a new acc and keep it uber secure, activate jag etc

item.title: About recovery fucking stupid
item.dc:creator: @erlasz erlasz
item.description:
@erlasz wrote:

i cant post on forums because i aint a member and how do i contact a mod?

Mod Harriet : If some unscrupulous rascal has been onto your account and changed your registered email address then do not fear, Mods will be here.

so what does that mean
